description.value:
Requirements You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] by a creature.

When you wriggle free from an enemy's grasp, you take something of theirs with you. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] from being grabbed or restrained by a creature. If you succeed, you can also attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Steal] from the creature, even if the creature is in combat.
